repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:stretch-slim 
LABEL maintainer="matthias.loeffel@gmail.com <Matthias LÃ¶ffel>" 

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive 
RUN apt-get update \
&& apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libxml2-utils bash curl \
&& apt-get clean \
&& apt-get autoclean \
&& mkdir -p /opt/urbanterror \  
  
WORKDIR /opt/urbanterror && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ADD install.sh . 
RUN ["bash", "install.sh"] 
CMD ["./Quake3-UrT-Ded.x86_64"] 
EXPOSE 27960
